meaning: That which is good (auspiciousness, prashastha) should be endlessly adhered to. Under no circumstances, even for a brief period should negatives be entertained. That which is inauspicious should be discarded. Time should never be wasted.
commentary: Prashastha charanam nityam aprashastra vivarjanamYetadhi mangalam proktam rishibhih brahmavAdibih
